proxy.title: Proxy
proxy.description: Proxies to use while scraping the proxies. Recommended.

runTests.title: Run tests?
runTests.description: Whether or not to test the proxies and only return the ones that pass. This will increase the run-time.

debug.title: Debug mode?
debug.description: Whether or not to run the scraper in debug mode (with extra log messages).

kvStoreName.title: Key-value store name
kvStoreName.description: The name of the store to save a .txt of the proxies in. Leave as "default" to save to the default one.
